Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO LOCAL GOVERNMENT

Title: Directs counties to develop and maintain comprehensive county emergency medical system plans
Summary: Directs counties, in coordination with their regional emergency medical services councils, to develop and maintain comprehensive county emergency medical system plans that provide for coordinated emergency medical systems within such counties.
LawCode: Amd ยง122-b, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law and the public health law, in relation to emergency medical services
